text:
I like this new clinic called Silkroutes @ Chai Chee next to my home Block,  the medicines
prescribed are special, good quality & effective, Dr Asrizam is competent & has a nice personality. This is my second visit, 1st visit medicine is special, good quality & effective.

This Spray prescribed by the doctor is very good, it soothes my inflammed throat & congested chest immediately üëçüèªüëçüèªüëçüèª I am Covid-19 Negative. Yesterday evening, my throat feels so sore, tight and lots of phlegm. Luckily, I am able to withstand till this morning to see doctor.

This is covered by company insurance no need to pay extra from myself with so many medicine including antibiotics.

They accept MHC card. Was very impressed with the services, waiting time and the nurse who attended. The Doctor also very friendly. I hate going to Doctor but this is the first time I leave clinic smiling. While waiting I can't help but to hear occasional laughter, every time a patient enters. Laughter is always the best medicine. Oh by the way, they give good medication

Staff are very warm and welcoming, the resident doctor is patient and takes the time to chat about your well-being regardless of what you are coming in for, also appreciate that he highlights any side effects of meds before prescribing.

I went through my first pregnancy with this clinic silkroutes @ chai chee. I have always been having my regular morning sickness and it was quite bad. Dr Asrizam always advice and never fail to remind me to slow down and take care of my health first before anything else. The counter staff was also friendly and amazing. Since I started going to this clinic, me and my husband have never been to any other
Dr Zam is a warm and helpful towards his patients. He gives excellent advises and suggestions. He also informed me of the latest government policies that can help me lower my medical expenses.
